data.title: First and Final Mile Shipping
data.meta_description: Arrange truck transfer between your facilities and our rail. Our first and last mile solutions can move your standard freight, bulk commodities, and palletized items.
data.text:
FROM RAIL TO ROAD,

WE GO FURTHER FOR YOU

Shipping can be complex. We keep it simple. Our team of experts will work with you to arrange truck transfer between your facilities and our rail for an all-in-one shipping solution.

Norfolk Southern recently announce the acquisition of the Great Lakes Reload (GLR) property, a premier Chicago transload and warehouse facility. The GLR has the infrastructure and capabilities to safely store and transload all commodity types, including steel, cement, lumber, and more. GLR joins our First and Final Mile Markets network, enabling us to convert more flexible freight to rail and enhance access to both new and existing markets for new and existing customers. Click below to take advantage of our expanded First and Final Mile Market Service portfolio.

Our TFT service delivers the convenience and flexibility of less-than-truckload shipping with the reliability of truck service at a fraction of the cost.

Expand your reach. Our short line connections can help you access new markets and get freight even closer to its destination. Explore our short line connections or login to your AccessNS account for detailed information.

Shipping industrial products? Modalgistics is our supply chain services group. Experts can help you explore the benefits of adding/expanding the use of rail products in your supply chain.
